msg: The "hash" argument clashes with STL hash.  Fixed by Pei Yong Zhang.

author: tng
msg: the start tag "<?xml" could be followed by (#x20 | #x9 | #xD | #xA)+.  Fixed by Pei Yong Zhang.

author: jberry
msg: Add support for querying error count following parse; enables simple parse without requiring error handler.

author: jberry
msg: Add support for tracking error count during parse; enables simple parse without requiring error handler.

author: knoaman
msg: Add a return value to satisfy compilers that complain about
no return value, although that code will not be executed.
